ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, good idea. I have a few thoughts on this as well.  Bidl Frugin may indeed be located in the Steamfont Mino s cave.  I have a feeling that the guards may
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, good idea.

I have a few thoughts on this as well. Bidl Frugin may indeed be located in
the Steamfont Mino's cave. I have a feeling that the guards may whack him as
soon as he spawns, much like Bandits will kill Giant Spiders and Bears in the
Karanas. Not sure about this, but its a thought. Secondly, is the lens quest
class specific? What generic gnome quests exist out there? Brewing is
another trade skill that is very quest related, so I think that this is a good
avenue to pursue.

Cheers
Malkin Fennin Ro
